internationalizations.description: I worked in Melbourne, Australia as system engineer for a while. Later moved to Singapore in 2016 and work as System Admin then DevOps engineer, managing the quality/security and release cycle of Zyllem Platform. I moved back to Ho Chi Minh at the end of 2020 to stay with my family. I'm able to work with team or individual and under high pressure. I'm eager to study new technology, love and want to explore more in devops, cloud & cyber security!
